about_the_game:
Bokuten Original Soundtrack & Vocal Collection

Features the BGM game tracks & full vocal songs from Bokuten - Why I Became an Angel!

- Original Soundtrack
01. A City Where Angels Live
02. Brand New Day
03. The Days Fly By
04. Crossing
05. Slapstick Angel
06. Let's Go
07. Hold Out Your Arms
08. A Breeze That Brushes Your Cheek
09. Rebirth
10. I Cry Your Name
11. In the Gentle Sunlight
12. Overflowing Emotions
13. White Out
14. Fragile
15. Lamp
16. Painted Black
17. Oasis
18. Thorns
19. Alone
20. Crying
21. Maze
22. Snow Crystals
23. In a Bind
24. Last Shooting
25. I'll Always Be With You
26. Feather Song
27. Dawn Light
28. Snow Song
29. Glass Bead
30. Forget-me-not
31. End of the World
32. Starlit Night (Arranged)
33. Goodbye Miracle
34. Vividness (Arranged)
35. It's Show Time!

- Vocal Collection

Arrow 2 Heart
01. Feather Song
02. Goodbye Miracle
03. End of the World
04. Dawn Light
05. GlassBead
06. Vividness
07. Forget-me-not
08. Starlit Night
09. Dozing Dreaming
10. Snow Song

Feather Song Single
01. Feather Song
02. Feather Song (Off Vocal)
03. Feather Song (Off Vocal & Guitar)
04. Feather Song (Off Vocal & Bass)
05. Feather Song (Off Vocal & Drum)
06. Feather Song (Off Vocal & Organ)

TARILATTA Single
01. TARILATTA
02. TARILATTA (Off Vocal)

The music files are provided in loss-less FLAC format and MP3!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP and up
  • Processor: Pentium III
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Bokuten - Why I Became an Angel's OST & Vocal Collections features 35 BGM tracks and full sized vocal tracks from the game!
